Hey there, I haven't posted here in awhile but I certainly have been keeping up to date with what's been going on!

So I have read that Tecmo is going to announce the "Best ___ Game Ever" soon and there is a lot of speculation as to what that blank space may have been.

Is there any chance, or has anyone heard of a possible MR game on a Sony platform? I read the story off of Gamespot if anyone was interested.

I have loved all the MR ever since the very first one came out and I skipped 3 days of school to play it. =P

I figure if anyone had any information on it it would be the good folks here!
